listing_title_link: div.licontent a[href*='property-to-rent/'], div.licontent a[href*='room-to-rent/'], div.image-container-link > a
listing_price: div.licontent span.price, div.licontent div.price, div.price-exp p.price strong
listing_location: div.licontent span.address, div.licontent div.address, a.property-title span.address
listing_bedrooms: div.licontent span[aria-label*='bedroom'], div.licontent li[class*='bedroom'], div.bottom-of-listing-details span:nth-child(1)
listing_bathrooms: div.licontent span[aria-label*='bathroom'], div.licontent li[class*='bathroom'], div.bottom-of-listing-details span:nth-child(2)
